name: Pixelworks
overview: Pixelworks is a fabless semiconductor company that designs, develops and markets innovative video and pixel processing chips and software for high-end display applications, including digital projection, large screen LCD flat panels and digital signage. Our solutions leverage proprietary core technologies that enable digital display and projection device manufacturers to differentiate their products with a consistently high level of video quality, regardless of the contentâ€™s source or format. Additionally, our solutions facilitate rapid development and customization of display devices, thus reducing time to market for our customers.
